pr_title: Add an oidvector type for use in pg_proc

timeline.message:
Add an oidvector type for use in pg_proc

Closes https://github.com/crate/crate/issues/10131

timeline.bodyText:
Decided to not base this on ArrayType because in PostgreSQL oidvector has different semantics in some places. For example index access is zero-based instead of one-based.
Given that this PR doesn't extend any scalar / function signatures to include oidvector these kind of operations will  be unsupported. We can still extend them later as needed.
timeline.author: mfussenegger
